titleStmt.title: The oration of Cicero for M. Marcellus done into English ; with an appendix relating to the Prince of Orange.
Pro Marcello. English
titleStmt.author: Cicero, Marcus Tullius.

notesStmt.note: Added t.p. and separate paging (31, [2] p.): An appendix to the translation of Tully's panegyrick on Julius Caesar for his restauration of M. Marcellus, relating to the Prince of Orange.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
